name: MUS
description:
MUS is the product of a 3 week cooperation between 6 students at The Royal Academy of Copenhagen where bachelor and masters’ students created a game in the span of 3 weeks in an Art Direction course.

MUS is a short playable prototype which allows the player to see the world and visual style the group of students has worked towards. 

This game is only a prototype and will not see further development!

--------------------------

Amongst the junk and ruins left behind by humans, a single mouse must fight for survival against bloodthirsty cat creatures who stalk the hallways of the abandoned houses of old.

Welcome to the world of MUS, a world of fright, horror and cats. Hide, sneak and outwit the cat creatures  in order to survive.

MUS is a 3D side scrolling horror platformer with surprisingly cute aesthetics. 

--------------------------

CREDITS:

Art direction: Troels Jørgensen

Game Director: A. Christian Larsson

Concept artist: Ida Lilja

Character artist: Lucia Mauri

3D artists: Rosa Friholm

3D artist:  Anastasia Jacobsen
